page.title: 08FARMING 03800597
page.content: Of the farms in the area{3 are owner_ {occupied}whilst the remainder are farmed by{tenants}who own the stock and rent the land.The{rented land}is owned by the Ministry of Defence, the Forestry Commission and 3 private landowners.The{hill farms}are stocked with Blackface ewes particularly suited to high ground.The majority go to sales at Bellingham in Autumn. Some farms also breed{suckler}cows In Summer{hay and silage}are made for { winter_feeding}of stock. Traditional methods of{shepherding}are employed. {Dogs}are still indispensable.In some cases the{farm bike}has replaced the horse and the use of{pregnancy { scanning}of the ewe is growing.The {Redesdale Experimental Husbandry Farm} looks into management techniques and ways of land improvement particularly relating to hill areas.
